website_summaries.verdict: If carrying comfort is a priority, this infant car seat is a solid choice. Lightweight and easy to carry without sacrificing safety or comfort.
pros: Buckle pockets allow for easy in and out and help keep tender skin safe from sunbaked metal
Padding is soft, supportive, and conveniently machine washable
cons: Narrower than some and large babies might outgrow it sooner than expected

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow carseat
customer_reviews.text: The car seat is very lightweight. However, it is very narrow and uncomfortably restrictive around my baby's shoulders. The car seat was ok for my average sized baby (7lb at birth) for about 2 months. It was almost impossible to buckle her in at even the biggest setting by the time she was 3 months. We ended up buying a new carseat. I find it hard to believe that this carseat could safely hold a 35lb child.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this car seat except the canopy/cover
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this car seat except the canopy/cover. The canopy or cover is very difficult to adjust and will not protect baby if it's raining as it doesn't extend beyond what is pictured. I wrongly thought I could use the canopy like I have had with any other Graco carseat I've owned where you can place it directly over the baby. I'm disappointed that my baby can get so wet just walking from the grocery store exit to our car in the parking lot. Other than that, the material seems easy to clean and all the clips are easy to use. It's a cinch to install. Love everything but the cover.
customer_reviews.author: R Grant Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Great color scheme and a nice extra for convenience
customer_reviews.text: The car seat has great padding. My twins seem comfortable. I like that there is a little slit to put the buckle in to hold the straps in place so they don’t slip behind baby while loading them. I saw reviews that said it is narrow but ultimately bought it anyway because of the light grey color. We live in a hot climate and I couldn’t imagine using anything with A black color scheme for babies born in July. I love the car seat and my 5 month old girls fit great in it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fivefish4me

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Update since having the seat for about 6 months: The canopy attachment is cracked. It would occasionally come apart but i never thought much of it and would just reattached it but its starting to come apart more often now. Original review: Its been great! Easy to install and the seat unlatches easily from the base. My little guy is only 3 weeks old but it seems like he'll have plenty of room to grow into!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish, safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! We’ve been using it for 3 months now. It’s super cute and our daughter loves it. She rarely cries in the car seat and she looks super comfy in it. She was 6lb 10oz when we left the hospital and she fit well in it! She was on the second strap hole, so it could’ve even sit a smaller baby since the straps go down once more. The base makes it super easy to install in the car. She just clicks right in and I don’t have to worry about messing with the seatbelt or making sure she’s inclined correctly. Definitely happy with this purchase! I wish I had gotten it for my other two.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Huckle

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Cushion is super soft and comfy. Very sturdy. Installation is no more difficult than any other carseat. This is our 4th baby so we are pros by now. The only thing I don't like is that the lever on the top back side that releases the carseat from the base does not release the carseat easily. It catches so I have to use both hands to squeeze the lever extra hard to get it to release. And it could just be the carseat I have. Maybe it's a small manufacturer error.
customer_reviews.author: Codi Hickey

customer_reviews.title: My Partner found this one , I love it !
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a higher ended brand car seat In ivory .. I thought it was better because it cost more then my partner found this one . I initially purchased both to compare them , this one is so much better it’s lite weight it’s not bulky and I love that it comes in ivory ! No strain on my C-Section .
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Safe, Affordable, and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This car seat was on every recommended infant car seat list. It is used as a back up, but it is such a nice seat. The only negative review I saw when researching was that it is difficult to install, and I could not disagree more!! It was SO easy to install (especially if you read the instructions- duh!). I have had to put this in and take it out multiple times, and it took only a few seconds. The straps are easy to move based on the size of your infant. Lightweight and cushiony.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: First time mom and I purchased this for my little one. It’s easy to use, pull apart, and clean. Very smooth fabric and love the head piece. It was a bit big at first but he quickly grew into it and I have always loved it. It’s a breeze to click in and out of your car. The handle is very easy to adjust and there is a level that shows where the seat should sit for the weight of your baby which I love! I highly recommend this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Best carseat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my car seat that was in an accident because it worked so well the first time! My son was in a rollover accident that the car was totaled and he didn’t have one scratch on him so I can tell you they work well! Also easy to install and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Beyondk

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, soft, bruises legs when I carry it.
customer_reviews.text: It is narrow, but no horribly. I have skinny kids though. The light gray show dirt. Biggest complaint is there is a notch on the side that bruises my legs while carrying. Easy to install and move base, that is why I got it, the straps adjust nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: this is the 2nd car seat I have ordered in half a year. The first one I ordered for a niece back in July and now this one for another niece to give week after next. I wish I could write more, but because I'm the giver and not the receiver, I can't answer anyone's questions if they any.
customer_reviews.author: S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Approximately 3 years ago, I purchased the travel combo evenflo and disliked the stroller but the carseat was comfortable. I gave away the carseat thinking I was done but to my surprise I am having another bundle of joy. I purchased this carseat as a replacement and not happy about the quality at all I would have returned it but my son will arrive soon.. I wish people are honset with their reviews...
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Light and great but canopy part sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Bought since I have twins. Only complaint is the canopy is cheap and I hate it. Its isnt sturdy and I feel like I can break it easily. A blanket on top can bend it easily if its "thick". Super light and easy to deal with. Weight capacity is great, esp is you're expecting a preemie.
customer_reviews.author: MamaKar3

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this carseat. The colors are great. A carseat I had in the past had a cut out in the back where the carseat locked into the base. This one does not. I liked the cutout in the back of the seat because it fit well on shopping carts. This carseat is lightweight and looks comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mary schreck

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Car seat was missing the infant insert. The manufacture date was March 2017 meaning two years of the seat’s use were already gone
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for big babies.
customer_reviews.text: We have a huge baby, so this worked great for us. At 6 months he had almost outgrown his 22 lb limit car seat, so we got this one. I really like how he sits deep down in this one with protective sidewalls. The strap sinching system is great. The little sternum clip is kind of stiff, but I'm sure it will get better with use. Very happy with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Koljag

customer_reviews.title: This car seat is too narrow
customer_reviews.text: My baby was born only 5.4 pond. It's fit to him. He is ten weeks right now. It is very narrow and uncomfortably for him. My husband always complaint this car seat too tiny. I think it hard to believe that this carseat could safely hold a 35lb child.
customer_reviews.author: micky chen

customer_reviews.title: Weird and Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: The CANOPY to the seat is a soft fabric without the center bone to keep it up, it does not adjust. If you want to move the canopy to the front of the seat to block out light you are unable to. What is pictured is the only available position on the seat canopy. The HANDLE is also weird as it doesn't come as far forward as most every other infant seat thus carrying it on you arm is made awkward. I would. not buy this seat again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Pictures show features not included!
customer_reviews.text: There are no "belt pockets" on the device. It's hard to tell what other features may be missing or slightly different. I would NOT purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron the Science Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent car seat. Love the look and how light it is. Easy to install the base in your vehicle and the car seat snaps in and out easy. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for an infant car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and easy to install my newborn seems very comfortable in it and has nice support to the head!
customer_reviews.author: Yazmin Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Our Needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Amazon's warehouse deals. Unit was used, but like new. Once received, unit did not look like it had been opened at all. All pieces of product were in box and perfectly intact! Using this seat for my newest infant. Super easy to install and use. Unit is light weight, so not hard on the back at all. Did end up putting in a different head support since my newborn was only 6lbs when coming home from hospital, but other than that, highly satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: Bri S

customer_reviews.title: Cushion impossible to remove.
customer_reviews.text: Liked how light weight the seat was however the cushion padding is near impossible to remove. I had my leg up on the seat for leverage to try to get the cushion out of the lock hole and only was able to remove one of them. I spent over 30 minutes fighting with it and decided it was not worth my time and returned the seat for a Chicco Keyfit 30. So irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Have 3 carts seats now for me, my girl and her grandma for are son. Havnt received yet but will love it .
customer_reviews.author: dominick

customer_reviews.title: Fav carseat
customer_reviews.text: I have had 5 kiddos. This is by far my favorite car seat as far as ease of use and weight goes. Slides into base easily, easy to install and UNinstall. Great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Sizemore Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my bff. She loves it and said it fit perfectly for her new baby
customer_reviews.author: Bless This Peach

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this car seat for 4 months now and I have to say I’m still in love with it! It’s lightweight, has excellent cushion, the cover is easily removable, the base was SUPER easy to install but very durable and doesn’t budge. My son doesn’t cry when he’s in it. Overall, I’m seriously so impressed! Worth every penny. :)
customer_reviews.author: MeLissa Peters

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had a car seat prior to this one and my little girl hated it. Did not give her the support and comfort like this one does. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for infants
customer_reviews.text: This car seat works great. It is easy to install and light enough to carry. My son was just over 5lbs when I brought him home from the hospital and it fits him well. He has grown some and has been doing great in it. He is comfortable in it and has been on a couple of road trips already. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up having to return this because the handle broke within the first week of using it. It was also way too narrow for my average size baby.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient because strap and button to adjust belt tightness is in front. This is light weight, soft, and works great. It doesn't fit on shopping cart, but still love this seat.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat! This is our 4th child and this is the best car seat we've had for any of them! And it's not a horrible price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable car seat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this car seat. The cushions are super soft and it holds my little one nice and snug, he was 5lbs. I prefer not to use the base since it makes the car seat more bulky, and I think it's more secure without it. Great price wish I would of bought this brand car seat for my daughter instead of spending a lot of money on a Graco car seat that didn't hold up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight and soft!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so light and comfy that I actually wanna sit in it. Lol but honestly this thing is super lightweight and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Corey D.

customer_reviews.title: Baby traveling
customer_reviews.text: Very much light weight. Great product for my 1st born.
customer_reviews.author: Kellkah626

customer_reviews.title: Great quality carseat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this carseat for my newborn. Its a sweet and simple clean design. I loved how inexpensive it was while the material and fabric they used where great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. Narrow enough I can fit 3 in a row in my Audi Q7 and it’s very soft/ padded material!
customer_reviews.author: Paul McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money & was compatible with our travel system we got for our baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: go PATS!!

customer_reviews.title: which is a key factor for someone like me that has twins
customer_reviews.text: Very light to carry, which is a key factor for someone like me that has twins! So I bought 2 of the Evenflo carseat and I have no complains so far
customer_reviews.author: Mary O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, price and it's light weight. Very happy I went with this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: bsingleton

customer_reviews.title: Have not used it yet, due in October 2018 ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet, due in October 2018. I am loving the material. Just what I was hoping for in look, played with and did adjustment and sure it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to lock into base, and just as easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is way lighter than my other infant car seat yest still feels safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: B Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: My first baby I purchased the cheaper baby trend and I hated that thing
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, fits well! It’s a decent car seat for the price! My first baby I purchased the cheaper baby trend and I hated that thing. This car seat looks and feels far superior for a little more money. Doesn’t have the weird handle thing either- I like the straight bar design.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Peters

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the new born
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is thrilled with it...perfect for the new born..
customer_reviews.author: Carole Pateman

customer_reviews.title: Fits in middle with carseat on each side
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it for baby yet, but it is very lightweight, and fits in my SUV with two other carseats. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Plus it's super soft for my baby to lay in
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any problems with carseat. Plus it's super soft for my baby to lay in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover fabric, feels supportive, but heavy. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture! Baby is due in 10/19 but it’s for my second child so I know what to expect. Looks perfect. 💜💙
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: great car seat
customer_reviews.text: great for small cars, very light weight and it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: carina

customer_reviews.title: ... this car seat for my granddaughter and it works great! It's lightweight which makes it easier for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for my granddaughter and it works great! It's lightweight which makes it easier for my daughter to carry her. I really appreciate the padding that it has which makes it more comfortable for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Carseat
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to clean it’s not lightweight but I don’t have to carry it
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Carter

customer_reviews.title: nice and roomy for my baby
customer_reviews.text: A wonder product, nice and roomy for my baby. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy and light weight!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is so perfect cant wait to put my baby girl in it. It is so easy to install and getting of and on the base. Also , is so light weight!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Could not install backwards
customer_reviews.text: The latch straps were not long enough to install the seat backwards with the latch system.
customer_reviews.author: Hoffman family

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was excited as it was exactly was she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Adalberto Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellence product will suit my Grandson well. I have nothing negative to say about this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat
customer_reviews.text: Great carseat, lightweight, easy to carry. My newborn loves it
customer_reviews.author: Sione Kamoto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and so far love it! I ordered just the car seat and it came with a base!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shade thingy sucks
customer_reviews.text: The shade thing at the top bent in and broke before the baby got here. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat it's super light weight and very well padded and for the price you can't beat it! Would diffently recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy May

customer_reviews.title: It is small and fits in our little car which was the selling point for us.
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used it yet for our baby but it seems like it will be exactly what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive/nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and very nice although a bit on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: Suzyfran33

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get in and out of the car, light weight, and simple to use!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Used, said open box ... car seat was dirty with baby food
customer_reviews.author: H. Hurston

customer_reviews.title: but I love the car seat already
customer_reviews.text: Our baby isn't here yet, but I love the car seat already. It's really adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: Not for my baby
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is perfect for babies who are tiny. The width of it was much to small for my 15 pound 4 month old baby... she couldn't lift her arms because it was too snug. She cried every time she went in. But the good thing about it was the padding. Very thing and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat in the Riverstone color. So cute and modern looking. Very lightweight and easy to strap in the base. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Helton

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Its breathable and baby loves it. As soon as hes in hes asleep. Update: Baby is 5 months old and almost outgrown this seat. He is a tall baby so if your baby isnt too tall it should last longer but it is defunct a great infant seat. My baby is 28 inches tall and weighs around 16 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: AvyG

customer_reviews.title: Great durable car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat! Have been using it up to 10 months now. My son is comfortable in it and the headrest is perfect, his head didn’t slide around. Easy to take off and wash and very easy to istall.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven-Leigh Mangelsdorf

product_meta.title: Evenflo LiteMax 35 Infant Car Seat, Easy to Install, Versatile & Convenient, Meets or Exceeds All Federal Safety Standards, Machine-Washable Pads, Full-Coverage Canopy, Riverstone Gray
product_meta.description: Color:Riverstone GrayEvenflo continues to redefine industry standards with ROLLOVER TESTED car seats. The LiteMax 35 Infant Car Seat is the easiest car seat to carry. It is designed with your lifestyle in mind. It's extremely lightweight carrier and ergo handle, is uniquely designed for your maximum comfort as you carry your little one. The LiteMax 35 also comes with an easy to install base equipped with a two step vehicle belt lock-off for a quick and secure installation. LiteMax 35 also provides 4 recline options to optimize your child's comfort on those long car rides.
feature_bullets: EVENFLO LIGHTWEIGHT CAR SEAT: The Evenflo LiteMax 35 Infant Car Seat is an easy-to-install and professionally designed infant carrier. It has been engineered and tested to meet or exceed all federal safety standards.

EASY TO INSTALL: The LiteMax 35 Infant Car Seat is built with a simple-to-install base with a 2-step vehicle belt lock-off, allowing for secure and fast installation. It also offers 4 reclining options to optimize comfort.

VERSATILE & CONVENIENT: Our new baby car seat includes a stay-in-car convenience base that makes things simple for parents. It’s a rear-facing infant car seat that fits newborns and babies from 4 to 35 pounds and 17 to 32 inches tall.

PARENT-FRIENDLY FEATURES: Evenflo’s baby seats include buckle pockets that tuck buckle tongues away for easier to load and unload, removable body and head pillows for improved comfort, machine-washable pads for simple cleanup and more.

TRUSTED FOR NEARLY 100 YEARS: Evenflo has been a trusted source of quality-built child-safety systems for almost 100 years. The real-life design of each of our products has been engineered for everyday use.

specifications.Care instructions: DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars248 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
